text: This Slack loses all message history  after about two weeks - so this is a great place to share stuff that you want to disappear after a short while! (which is probably why noone posts here :thinking_face:) I avoid the word "art" anyway ... :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing::rolling_on_the_floor_laughing::rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:

elements.text: This Slack loses all message history  after about two weeks - so this is a great place to share stuff that you want to disappear after a short while! (which is probably why noone posts here

text:
Somehow, that is artistic and poetic in itself... Ephemeral art for the enjoyment of those before it is lost to the Slack Hole.

Fleeting. Beautiful. Gone.
